rules.name: 75% WFH 25% WFO
rules.more: Limit the capacity of office workspace by sending 75% of employees to work from home (WFH) and 25% to work from office (WFO).

rules.name: Limit Business Hours
rules.more: All businesses are mandatory to implement covid-19 health protocol and limit operational hours only until 8PM on weekdays except for pharmacy.

rules.name: Limited Capacity for Restaurants and Coffee Shops
rules.more: Restaurants, cafe, and coffee shops are to limit their space capacity to 25%. Operational hours only until 8 PM.

rules.name: All Recreational Centers Closed
rules.more: All recreational centers like sports clubs, swimming pools, theaters, and parks are not allowed to operate.

rules.name: Public Transportation Restrictions
rules.more:
Public transportations only allowed to fill 50% of their capacity. 
Operational Hours: 04:30 AM - 09.00 PM.

rules.name: Limit Worship Places Capacity
rules.more: Worship places only allowed 50% of the capacity with tight covid-19 strict protocol. Masks are mandatory upon entering and it needs to be worn at all times.
